short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sign in to the MPCVault Console to manage your assets, send payments, interact with dApps, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MPCVault Browser Plugin is a browser extension that enables users of MPCVault to connect and interact with decentralized applications (dApps) that support the MetaMask protocol.

MPCVault is a non-custodial wallet for Web3 teams and businesses. It is multi-chain, multi-sig, and multi-asset. Securing millions of transfers daily, MPCVault is trusted by over 100 global businesses, including top-tier Web3 projects, trading firms, and VCs.
